attributes.name: Component
attributes.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Diagnosis, Biospecimen, scRNA-seq Assay, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.

attributes.name: HTAN Patient ID
attributes.description: HTAN ID associated with a patient based on HTAN ID SOP

attributes.name: Ethnicity
attributes.description:
An individual's self-described social and cultural grouping, specifically whether an individual describes themselves as Hispanic or Latino. The provided values are based on the categories
defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description:
Text designations that identify gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles. [Identification
of gender is based upon self-report and may come from a form, questionnaire, interview, etc.]

attributes.name: Race
attributes.description: An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species. It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation withina a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution.

attributes.name: Vital Status
attributes.description: The survival state of the person registered on the protocol.

attributes.name: Days to Birth
attributes.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date from a person's date of birth represented as a calculated negative number of days.

attributes.name: Age at Index
attributes.description: The patient's age (in years) on the reference or anchor date used during date obfuscation.

attributes.name: Age Is Obfuscated
attributes.description: The age of the patient has been modified for compliance reasons. The actual age differs from what is reported. Other date intervals for this patient may also be modified.

attributes.name: Year Of Birth
attributes.description: Numeric value to represent the calendar year in which an individual was born.

attributes.name: Occupation Duration Years
attributes.description: The number of years a patient worked in a specific occupation.

attributes.name: Premature At Birth
attributes.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the patient was premature (less than 37 weeks gestation) at birth.

attributes.name: Weeks Gestation at Birth
attributes.description: Numeric value used to describe the number of weeks starting from the approximate date of the biological mother's last menstrual period and ending with the birth of the patient.

attributes.name: Cause of Death
attributes.description: Cause of death

attributes.name: Cause of Death Source
attributes.description: The text term used to describe the source used to determine the patient's cause of death.

attributes.name: Days to Death
attributes.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date from a person's date of death represented as a calculated number of days.

attributes.name: Year of Death
attributes.description: Numeric value to represent the year of the death of an individual.

attributes.name: downloadLink
attributes.description: Download file from Synapse

attributes.name: Component
attributes.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Diagnosis, Biospecimen, scRNA-seq Assay, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.

attributes.name: HTAN Patient ID
attributes.description: HTAN ID associated with a patient based on HTAN ID SOP

attributes.name: Treatment or Therapy
attributes.description: A yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the administration of therapeutic agents received.

attributes.name: Treatment Type
attributes.description: Text term that describes the kind of treatment administered.

attributes.name: Treatment Effect
attributes.description: The text term used to describe the pathologic effect a treatment(s) had on the tumor.

attributes.name: Treatment Outcome
attributes.description: Text term that describes the patient's final outcome after the treatment was administered.

attributes.name: Days to Treatment End
attributes.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the treatment ended.

attributes.name: Treatment Anatomic Site
attributes.description: The text term used to describe the anatomic site of resection; biopsy; tissue or organ of biospecimen origin; progression or recurrent disease; treatment

attributes.name: Days to Treatment Start
attributes.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the treatment started.

attributes.name: Initial Disease Status
attributes.description: The text term used to describe the status of the patient's malignancy when the treatment began.

attributes.name: Regimen or Line of Therapy
attributes.description: The text term used to describe the regimen or line of therapy.

attributes.name: Therapeutic Agents
attributes.description: Text identification of the individual agent(s) used as part of a treatment regimen.

attributes.name: Treatment Intent Type
attributes.description: Text term to identify the reason for the administration of a treatment regimen. [Manually-curated]

attributes.name: downloadLink
attributes.description: Download file from Synapse

attributes.name: Component
attributes.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Diagnosis, Biospecimen, scRNA-seq Assay, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.

attributes.name: Filename
attributes.description: Name of a file

attributes.name: File Format
attributes.description: Format of a file (e.g. txt, csv, fastq, bam, etc.)

attributes.name: HTAN Parent Biospecimen ID
attributes.description: HTAN Biospecimen Identifier from which these files were derived [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1podtPP8L1UNvVxx9_c_szlDcU1f8n7bige6XA_GoRVM/edit?usp=sharing]

attributes.name: HTAN ID
attributes.description: HTAN Participant Identifier

attributes.name: Nucleic Acid Source
attributes.description: The source of the input nucleic molecule

attributes.name: Cryopreserved Cells in Sample
attributes.description: Indicate if library preparation was based on revived frozen cells.

attributes.name: Single Cell Isolation Method
attributes.description: The method by which cells are isolated into individual reaction containers at a single cell resolution (e.g. wells, micro-droplets)

attributes.name: Dissociation Method
attributes.description: The tissue dissociation method used for scRNASeq assays

attributes.name: Library Construction Method
attributes.description: Process which results in the creation of a library from fragments of DNA using cloning vectors or oligonucleotides with the role of adaptors [OBI_0000711]

attributes.name: Library Layout
attributes.description: Sequencing read type

attributes.name: End Bias
attributes.description: The end of the cDNA molecule that is preferentially sequenced, e.g. 3/5 prime tag/end or the full length transcript

attributes.name: Reverse Transcription Primer
attributes.description: An oligo to which new deoxyribonucleotides can be added by DNA polymerase [SO_0000112]. The type of primer used for reverse transcription, e.g. oligo-dT or random primer. This allows users to identify content of the cDNA library input e.g. enriched for mRNA

attributes.name: Spike In
attributes.description: A set of known synthetic RNA molecules with known sequence that are added to the cell lysis mix

attributes.name: Sequencing Platform
attributes.description: A platform is an object aggregate that is the set of instruments and software needed to perform a process [OBI_0000050]

attributes.name: Total Number of Input Cells
attributes.description: Number of cells loaded/placed on plates

attributes.name: Input Cells and Nuclei
attributes.description: Number of cells and number of nuclei input; entry format: number, number

attributes.name: Library Preparation Date
attributes.description: The date that the libraries were prepared for sequencing (in number of days since sample received in lab)

attributes.name: Single Cell Dissociation Date
attributes.description: The date when the sample was dissociated and cells were isolated (date format)

attributes.name: Sequencing Library Construction Date
attributes.description: Date of sequencing library construction part of library construction (in number of days since sample received in lab)

attributes.name: Nucleic Acid Capture Date
attributes.description: Date of nucleic acid capture part of library construction (in number of days since sample received in lab)

attributes.name: Protocol Link
attributes.description: TBD

attributes.name: Technical Replicate Group
attributes.description: A common term for all files belonging to the same cell or library. Provide a numbering of each library prep batch (can differ from encapsulation and sequencing batch)

attributes.name: Cell Barcode Length
attributes.description: Length of cell barcode read (in bp): number

attributes.name: Cell Barcode Offset
attributes.description: Offset in sequence for cell barcode read (in bp): number

attributes.name: Empty Well Barcode
attributes.description: Unique cell barcode assigned to empty cells used as controls in CEL-seq2 assays.

attributes.name: Feature Reference Id
attributes.description: Unique ID for this feature. Must not contain whitespace, quote or comma characters. Each ID must be unique and must not collide with a gene identifier from the transcriptome [https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/software/pipelines/latest/using/feature-bc-analysis#feature-ref]

attributes.name: Median UMIs per Cell Number
attributes.description: Number

attributes.name: Read1
attributes.description: Read 1 content description

attributes.name: Read2
attributes.description: Read 2 content description

attributes.name: Spike In Concentration
attributes.description: The final concentration or dilution (for commercial sets) of the spike in mix [PMID:21816910]

attributes.name: UMI Barcode Length
attributes.description: Length of UMI barcode read (in bp): number

attributes.name: UMI Barcode Offset
attributes.description: Start position of UMI barcode in the sequence. Values: number, 0 for start of read

attributes.name: Valid Barcodes Cell Number
attributes.description: Number

attributes.name: Well Index
attributes.description: Indicate if protein expression (EPCAM/CD45) positive/negative data  is available for each cell in CEL-seq2 assays

attributes.name: cDNA Length
attributes.description: Length of cDNA read (in bp): number

attributes.name: cDNA Offset
attributes.description: Offset in sequence for cDNA read (in bp): number

attributes.name: downloadLink
attributes.description: Download file from Synapse

attributes.name: Component
attributes.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Diagnosis, Biospecimen, scRNA-seq Assay, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.

attributes.name: HTAN Patient ID
attributes.description: HTAN ID associated with a patient based on HTAN ID SOP

attributes.name: Smoking Exposure
attributes.description: Indicate if individual has smoking exposure

attributes.name: Asbestos Exposure
attributes.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the patient was exposed to asbestos.

attributes.name: Coal Dust Exposure
attributes.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether a patient was exposed to fine powder derived by the crushing of coal.

attributes.name: Environmental Tobacco Smoke Exposure
attributes.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether a patient was exposed to smoke that is emitted from burning tobacco, including cigarettes, pipes, and cigars. This includes tobacco smoke exhaled by smokers.

attributes.name: Radon Exposure
attributes.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the patient was exposed to radon.

attributes.name: Respirable Crystalline Silica Exposure
attributes.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether a patient was exposured to respirable crystalline silica, a widespread, naturally occurring, crystalline metal oxide that consists of different forms including quartz, cristobalite, tridymite, tripoli, ganister, chert and novaculite.

attributes.name: Cigarettes per Day
attributes.description: The average number of cigarettes smoked per day.

attributes.name: Pack Years Smoked
attributes.description: Numeric computed value to represent lifetime tobacco exposure defined as number of cigarettes smoked per day x number of years smoked divided by 20.

attributes.name: Smoking Frequency
attributes.description: The text term used to generally decribe how often the patient smokes.

attributes.name: Time between Waking and First Smoke
attributes.description: TBD

attributes.name: Tobacco Smoking Onset Year
attributes.description: The year in which the participant began smoking.

attributes.name: Tobacco Smoking Quit Year
attributes.description: The year in which the participant quit smoking.

attributes.name: Tobacco Smoking Status
attributes.description: Category describing current smoking status and smoking history as self-reported by a patient

attributes.name: Type of Tobacco Used
attributes.description: The text term used to describe the specific type of tobacco used by the patient.

attributes.name: downloadLink
attributes.description: Download file from Synapse
